item.title: More stocks that are adopting MicroStrategy's bitcoin yield strategy
item.description: More and more bitcoin miners are starting to undertake a strategy harnessed by MicroStrategy, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery shares surge 15% after company announces linear, streaming restructuring
item.description: Warner Bros. announced a restructuring plan to segment its business into linear and streaming units in a move that could simplify future consolidation...

item.title: Trump says the U.S. is going to do 'something great with crypto'
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump spoke with CNBC's Jim Cramer at the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday.

item.title: Trump rings bell at NYSE to cheers of 'USA' as Wall Street CEOs, business leaders look on
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump, who seeks to attract and boost business in the U.S., was greeted with enthusiasm from the NYSE crowd.

item.title: FAA head Michael Whitaker to step down before Trump takes office
item.description: Mike Whitaker, head of the FAA, the key agency that oversees Boeing and the U.S. airline industry, said he will step down Jan. 20, as Donald Trump tak...
